channel.title: Always wondered
channel.description: Im not good at this things, nore will i probobly ever will be... But i really wanna make me a pure and i wanna use a autoer to do so, the proboblem is im scared that the autoer will get the account banned or will track down my main and get it banned... So i was wondering if all autoers can be detected by jagex cuz i heard there are some autoers that jagex cant detect...

item.title: Always wondered
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

No what I meant was, if he was though a different proxy everytime he logged in, then if they IP banned him they couldn’t find his main.

Read full topic

item.title: Always wondered
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

connecting through a proxy will do very little if you are banned.
So you say someone was on your account other than you. They will say the account was still breaking the rules.
Proxies do very little for you.
The best thing to do would be to get a decent script

Read full topic

item.description:

Do you have FireFox?

item.title: Always wondered
item.dc:creator: @your_enemy your enemy
item.description:
@your_enemy wrote:

bullzeye95:

Jagex CAN detect them all. As for your main, connect through a proxy and you’ll be safe.

this is going to sound n33bish but, how do i connect through a proxy?? i have cable internet, fyi.

thanks

Read full topic

item.description:

I didn’t mean SAFE, but I meant not IP banned safe.

item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

you’re never safe. when autoing you always take the risk of being banned.
NOTHING is undetectable and NOTHING is flawless
